quote: Marah will come looking for me one day, Kate had said, pressing the journal into my hands. Be with her when she reads it. And my boys… show them these words when they can’t remember me.
quote_letters: MARAH WILL COME LOOKING FOR ME ONE DAY KATE HAD SAID PRESSING THE JOURNAL INTO MY HANDS BE WITH HER WHEN SHE READS IT AND MY BOYS SHOW THEM THESE WORDS WHEN THEY CANT REMEMBER ME
